summary: A man and woman from feuding families each pretend to fall in love, as part of a revenge plot. Chaos ensues when their fake romance becomes a reality.
cast: Akshaye Khanna|Kareena Kapoor|Amrish Puri|Lakshmi|Sunil Shetty|Jackie Shroff|Paresh Rawal|Arbaaz Khan|Arshad Warsi|Farha Naaz|Shakti Kapoor|Manoj Joshi|Asrani|Akhilendra Mishra|Deep Dhillon|Upasna Singh|Ada Puri|Babu Rao|Paresh Bramhbhatt|Mumait Khan|Zabyn Khan|Mayur Phukan
title: Hulchul
